items.message:
Property flooding is not currently expected.
River levels are falling on the River Thame upstream of Stadhampton. River levels are rising slowly in Stadhampton and Dorchester as the peak moves downstream. River levels are still high but falling in the Thame area. Therefore, flooding of roads and farmland is expected to continue. 
Today is forecast to be mostly dry with the chance of showers and tomorrrow should be dry. However, river levels still pose a flood risk.
We are closely monitoring the situation. 
Please remain safe and aware of your local surroundings and refer to the 'River and Sea levels in England' webpage for current river levels. 
This message will be updated this evening, 26/10/2021, or as the situation changes.
